title: 神奇宝贝mod怎么让地皮世界停止刷精灵？
txt_content: 神奇宝贝mod怎么让地皮世界停止刷精灵？ 求解

replies.author: LexOBurner
replies.txt_content: /mv modify set difficulty 0 【MV多世界插件指令】

replies.author: The_BoLe
replies.txt_content: 删除地皮重新生成就好了

replies.author: a1216884366
replies.txt_content: 输入/mv modify set diff 0   设为和平模式

replies.author: 奇妙之旅
